g.text: SmartDerivativeContract with Settlement-Token and off-chain Valuation Service
tx 'deploy' a SDC with token address
tx 'transferFrom' margin buffers and termination fees
to SDC address for CP1 and CP2
tx 'transferFrom' optional Upfront Fee from Paying to Receiving Party
Caps Settlement Amount at Margin Buffer Level
tx 'transferFrom' settlement amount from Paying Party to Receiving Party Balance
tx 'transfer' Settlement Amount from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
tx 'transfer' Termination Fee from SDC Balance to Receiving Party
